TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed PrecompilationFlags extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Provides flags that determine precompilation behavior.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The `PrecompilationFlags` class defines the behavior of the build manager during precompilation. The <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager> class takes `PrecompilationFlags` as one of its constructor parameters. Precompilation can be performed programmatically through <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager> or through the Aspnet_compiler.exe command-line tool.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.Compilation.PrecompilationFlags AllowPartiallyTrustedCallers = int32(32)

Docs.summary: An attribute is generated for the assemblies, which means the assemblies can be called by partially trusted code. The flag will be added as a compilation symbol.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.Compilation.PrecompilationFlags Clean = int32(8)

Docs.summary: The application will be built "clean": Any previously compiled components will be recompiled. This field corresponds to the switch on Aspnet_compiler.exe.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.Compilation.PrecompilationFlags CodeAnalysis = int32(16)

Docs.summary: The flag will be added as a compilation symbol.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.Compilation.PrecompilationFlags Default = int32(0)

Docs.summary: The default value; no special behavior specified for precompilation.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.Compilation.PrecompilationFlags DelaySign = int32(64)

Docs.summary: The assembly is not fully signed when created. The assembly can be signed later by a signing tool such as Sn.exe. The flag will be added as a compilation symbol.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.Compilation.PrecompilationFlags FixedNames = int32(128)

Docs.summary: The assembly is generated with fixed names for the Web pages. The files are not batched during compilation and instead are compiled individually to produce the fixed names.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.Compilation.PrecompilationFlags ForceDebug = int32(4)

Docs.summary: The compiler will emit debug information. This field corresponds to the switch on Aspnet_compiler.exe.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.Compilation.PrecompilationFlags IgnoreBadImageFormatException = int32(256)

Docs.summary: The compiler will ignore bad image format exceptions.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.Compilation.PrecompilationFlags OverwriteTarget = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The target directory can be overwritten. This field corresponds to the switch on Aspnet_compiler.exe for a previously precompiled target.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.Compilation.PrecompilationFlags Updatable = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The deployed application will be updatable. This field corresponds to the switch on Aspnet_compiler.exe.
